CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
AFS          	WITHIN FLIGHT STANDARD SERVICE   	AFS                        
ATS          	AIR TRAFFIC SERVICE              	ATS                       
DOD         	U.S. MILITARY SERVICE            	DOD                        
FAA          	OTHER FAA ORGANIZATIONAL UNIT    	FAA                       
LSG          	LOCAL/STATE GOVERNMENT           	LSG                        
NTS          	NTSB                             	NTS                        
OPP          	OPERATOR OR PILOT INVOLVED      	OPP                        
OTH          	OTHER OR UNKNOWN                 	OTH                        
USG          	OTHER U.S. GOVERNMENT AGENCY     	USG                       
99999        	NOTIFY METHOD INVALID            	ERROR MESSAGE
